Credit Officer Job at Castville Solutions




        
    

        
        Castville Solutions is a recruitment and business solutions provider specializing in the healthcare sector. We focus on connecting healthcare facilities with highly skilled professionals, enabling efficient operations, and driving business growth. Our services extend to recruitment, Templates for process and operations management, SOP development, and healthcare-specific training, with a clear mission to transform the healthcare workforce and operations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Credit Officer

Job Location: New benin, Adesuwa-Gra, Eyaen - Edo
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary
     

            
    




	We are seeking for a Credit Officerresponsible for evaluating loan applications, assessing the creditworthiness of clients, monitoring repayment activities, and ensuring compliance with the organization’s credit policies.
	The role involves maintaining a healthy loan portfolio, minimizing risk, and supporting clients with financial guidance.


Key Responsibilities


	Evaluate loan applications and analyze applicants’ financial status, credit data, and repayment ability.
	Conduct risk assessment and recommend loan approvals or rejections based on established criteria.
	Monitor and follow up on loan repayments to minimize default rates.
	Maintain accurate records of credit applications, approvals, disbursements, and repayments.
	Conduct field visits to verify client information and assess collateral


Qualifications & Skills


	Bachelor’s Degree in Finance, Accounting, Business Administration, Economics, or a related field.
	Proven experience in credit analysis, loan processing, or banking.
	Strong analytical, decision-making, and risk assessment skills.
	Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.
	Proficiency in MS Office (Excel, Word, Outlook); experience with loan management software is an advantage.


Note: For more Enquiries contact WhatsApp number: 09010634633.

Software Developer Job at Green Africa Airways Limited




        
    

        
        Green Africa Airways Limited is a value airline based in Lagos, Nigeria. We are a new carrier that offers safe, reliable and affordable air travel to a much broader group of customers. This positions us as a significant contributor to the economic development of Nigeria and the African continent.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Software Developer

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job role
     

            
    




	Design and develop scalable backend services and RESTful/GraphQL APIs using Laravel PHP and Node.js with NestJS, ensuring application performance and security.
	Build efficient database schemas, optimize queries, and maintain databases including MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB.
	Create responsive, interactive, and high-performance user interfaces with React and Next.js, implementing modern frontend architectures with effective state management.
	Develop reusable frontend components, maintain design systems, and ensure crossbrowser compatibility and performance optimization.
	Integrate frontend applications seamlessly with backend services, implementing server-side rendering (SSR) and static site generation (SSG) where appropriate.
	Collaborate on end-to-end feature development, participate in architectural decisions, and contribute to technical planning for scalable applications.
	Write comprehensive unit and integration tests, debug and troubleshoot issues across the full stack, and maintain high code quality through code reviews.
	Work closely with DevOps teams to manage deployments, infrastructure, and ensure smooth operation of applications in cloud environments.


Qualifications


	 BSc/HND in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field, with 4+ years of professional software development experience.
	Strong expertise in backend development using Laravel PHP and Node.js with the NestJS framework.
	Advanced frontend development skills with React and Next.js, including responsive design and state management.
	Proficiency in TypeScript for building type-safe and maintainable code across the stack.
	Solid understanding of database design, optimization, and experience working with MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB.
	Experience designing and consuming RESTful APIs, with familiarity in GraphQL and WebSocket integrations.
	Knowledge of version control systems (Git) and strong understanding of software testing principles and frameworks.
	Excellent problem-solving, time-management, and organizational skills with the ability to meet time-sensitive deadlines.
	Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with a creative, self-motivated mindset eager to learn and grow in a fast-paced environment.
